testcase.purpose: This test validates the WebIDL included in the DeviceCapabilities specification
Check if the Navigator system attribute must not be null
Check if getAVCodecs method of DeviceCapabilities can work properly
Check if getCPUInfo method of DeviceCapabilities can work properly
Check if getDisplayInfo method of DeviceCapabilities can work properly
Check if getMemoryInfo method of DeviceCapabilities can work properly
Check if getStorageInfo method of DeviceCapabilities can work properly
Check if the implementation of DeviceCapabilities onstorageattach event is valid
Check if the implementation of DeviceCapabilities onstoragedetach event is valid
Check if the implementation of DeviceCapabilities ondisplayconnect event is valid
Check if the implementation of DeviceCapabilities ondisplaydisconnect event is valid
Check if the implementation of SystemDisplayEvent DisplayUnit attribute is not null when connect a display
Check if the implementation of SystemDisplayEvent DisplayUnit attribute is not null when disconnect a display
Check if the implementation of SystemStorageEvent StorageUnit attribute is not null when attach a storage
Check if the implementation of SystemStorageEvent StorageUnit attribute is not null when detach a storage
Check if the impelmentation of SystemCPU numOfProcessors attribute is valid
Check if the impelmentation of SystemCPU archName attribute is valid
Check if the impelmentation of SystemCPU load attribute is valid
Check if the cpu load is between 0 and 1
Check if the information of SystemCPU is valid according to the test device
Check if the implementation of SystemMemory capacity attribute is valid
Check if the impelmentation of SystemMemory availCapacity attribute is valid
Check if availCapacity must not be greater than capacity
Check if the information of SystemMemory is valid according to the test device
Check if the SystemStorage storages attribute must not be null when getStorageInfo method is invoked
Check if the implementation of StorageUnit id attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of StorageUnit name attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of StorageUnit type attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of StorageUnit capacity attribute is valid
Check if the information of StorageUnit is valid according to the test device
Check if the SystemDisplay displays attribute must not be null when getDisplayInfo method is invoked
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit id attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit name attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit primary attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit external attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit deviceXDPI attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit deviceYDPI attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit availWidth attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit availHeight attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit width attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit height attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit colorDepth attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of DisplayUnit pixelDepth attribute is valid
Check if the DisplayUnit availHeight attribute must not be greater than height
Check if the DisplayUnit availWidth attribute must not be greater than width
Check if if the information of DisplayUnit is valid according to the test device
Check if the SystemAVCodecs audioCodecs attribute must not be null when getAVCodecs method is invoked
Check if the SystemAVCodecs videoCodecs attribute must not be null when getAVCodecs method is invoked
Check if the information of AudioCodec is valid according to the test device
Check if the implementation of AudioCodec format attribute is valid
Check if the implementation of VideoCodec format attribute is vaild
Check if the implementation of VideoCodec hwAccel attribute is vaild
Check if the implementation of VideoCodec encode attribute is vaild
Check if the information of VideoCodec is valid according to the test device
Check if the readonly attribute Navigator.system exists and typeof object
Check if the DeviceCapabilities.getCPUInfo exists and typeof function
Check if the DeviceCapabilities.getMemoryInfo exists and typeof function
Check if the DeviceCapabilities.getStorageInfo exists and typeof function
Check if the DeviceCapabilities.getDisplayInfo exists and typeof function
Check if the DeviceCapabilities.getAVCodecs exists and typeof function
Check if the readonly attribute SystemStorageEvent.StorageUnit exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute SystemDisplayEvent.DisplayUnit exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute SystemCPU.archName exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute SystemCPU.load exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute SystemCPU.numOfProcessors exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute SystemMemory.availCapacity exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute SystemMemory.capacity exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute SystemStorage.storages exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute StorageUnit.capacity exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute StorageUnit.id exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute StorageUnit.name exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute StorageUnit.type exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute SystemDisplay.displays exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.deviceXDPI exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.deviceYDPI exists and typeof number
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.external exists and typeof boolean
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.id exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.name exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute DisplayUnit.primary exists and typeof boolean
Check if the readonly attribute SystemAVCodecs.audioCodecs exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute SystemAVCodecs.videoCodecs exists and typeof object
Check if the readonly attribute AudioCodec.format exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute VideoCodec.encode exists and typeof boolean
Check if the readonly attribute VideoCodec.format exists and typeof string
Check if the readonly attribute VideoCodec.hwAccel exists and typeof boolean
